name: ts4-tooling
description: Setting up Typescript 4 compilation from Javascript Weekly article

scripts.setupinit: npm install --save-dev typescript prettier eslint eslint-plugin-import eslint-config-prettier ts-jest @typescript-eslint/parser @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @jest/globals
scripts.preauto: npm run format && npm run eslint && npm run compile
scripts.preall: npm run format && npm run eslint && npm run check && npm run compile && npm run test && npm run test:loud && npm run fast && npm run build
scripts.all: npm run app && npm run app2

author: Brent S.A. Cowgill
